```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(class)
```

```{r}
set.seed(121)
x<-runif(11, 0, 1)
y<-runif(11, 0, 1)
C<-sample(c("A","B"), replace = T, size = 11)
d3<-data.frame(x,y,C)
```

```{r}
d4 <- expand.grid(x = seq(from = .25, to = 1, length.out = 60), y =  seq(from = 0, to = 1, length.out = 60) )
```


```{r}
knn_pred <- knn(
 d3 %>% select(x,y), d4, d3$C, k =3
)

decision <- data.frame(d4, knn_pred)
```


```{r}
ggplot()+geom_point(data = d3, aes(x = x, y = y, color = C))+annotate(geom = "point", x = .5, y = .5, color = "purple") + annotate(geom = "text", x = .53, y = .52, label = "x0")+labs(x = "X1", y = "X2" )+geom_point(data = decision, aes(x = x, y = y, color = knn_pred), size = .2, alpha = .75)+theme_bw()
```
